pageTitle: Itinerary for Tuesday, May 10, 2016 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Itinerary for the Prime Minister, Justin Trudeau, for Tuesday, May 10, 2016:

Ottawa

9:30 a.m. The Prime Minister will attend the Cabinet Meeting.

Notes for media:

  • Ministers will be available to media in the House of Commons Foyer as of 12:00 p.m.


12:30 p.m. The Prime Minister will meet with Mr. Hu Chunhua, Politburo Member of the Communist Party of China and Party Secretary of Guangdong Province.

Centre Block, Office of the Prime Minister
Parliament Hill
Ottawa, Ontario

Notes for media:

  • Photo opportunity only


2:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will attend Question Period.

4:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will deliver remarks at Canadaâ€™s Building Trades Unions Policy Conference.

The Westin Ottawa
Confederation 1 Room
11 Colonel By Drive
Ottawa, Ontario

Notes for media:

  • Open media coverage
  • Media should arrive no later than 3:30 p.m.


5:30 p.m. The Prime Minister will hold a bilateral meeting with President Andrzej Duda of Poland.

Centre Block, Office of the Prime Minister
Parliament Hill
Ottawa, Ontario

Notes for media:

  • Photo opportunity only


PMO Media Relations:
Media@pmo-cpm.gc.ca
613-957-5555
